detail.description: KRBL is worlds leading basmati rice producer and has fully integrated operations in every aspect of basmati value chain, right from seed development, contract farming, procurement of paddy, storage, processing, packaging, branding and marketing.(Source : 202003 Annual Report Page No:181)
